com.microsoft.msr.RiotEmulator

Class RIoT.DeviceAuthBundle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.msr.RiotEmulator.RIoT.DeviceAuthBundle
  • Enclosing class:
    RIoT

    public static class RIoT.DeviceAuthBundle
extends Object
    Container for PEM-encoded keys and certificates created by the RIoT Emulator
